title: One Greek's View On The Election
teaser: Athens art gallery owner Christina Androulidaki says she's not sure Alexis Tsipras can live up to his promises to renegotiate the bailout.
contentencoded:
Christina Androulidaki owns an art gallery in Athens. She did not vote for the Syriza party because she’s not sure that Alexis Tsipras can live up to his promises to renegotiate the bailout.Â She joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the election.

Guest

  • Christina Androulidaki, owner of the Christina Androulidaki Art Gallery in Athens.
